Remap group values in a tfrmt

Source: R/tfrmt_layer.R
update_group.Rd

Remap group values in a tfrmt

Usage

update_group(tfrmt, ...)

Arguments

tfrmt

a tfrmt

...

Use new_name = old_name to rename selected variables

Value

A tfrmt with the group variables updated in all places

tfrmt object with updated groups#'

Examples


tfrmt_spec <- tfrmt(
    group = c(group1, group2),
    body_plan  = body_plan(
      frmt_structure(
         group_val = list(group2 = "value"),
         label_val = ".default",
         frmt("XXX")
         ),
     frmt_structure(
         group_val = list(group1 = "value", group2 = "value"),
         label_val = ".default",
         frmt("XXX")
       )
    ))

tfrmt_spec %>%
  update_group(New_Group = group1)
#> $group
#> <list_of<quosure>>
#> 
#> [[1]]
#> <quosure>
#> expr: ^New_Group
#> env:  0x55932b02ae48
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> <quosure>
#> expr: ^group2
#> env:  0x55932b028160
#> 
#>

#> <quosure>
#> expr: ^
#> env:  empty
#>

#> <quosure>
#> expr: ^
#> env:  empty
#>

#> <quosure>
#> expr: ^
#> env:  empty
